summary:
Powerful and unique poisoned weapons. Get them during quests on powerful enemies.
New custom \"enchantments\": Spriggan Curse, Dark Venom and Cold Death. Includes a bow, a sword and two daggers.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5][color=lightgreen]UNIQUE POISONED WEAPONS[/color][/size][/b]

[img]http://www.skyrimwiki.com/images/thumb/7/76/BladeofWoe.png/200px-BladeofWoe.png[/img][/center]

[size=3][b]Introduction[/b][/size]

Powerful and unique poisoned weapons. Get them during quests, while exploring or on powerful enemies. New custom \"enchantments\" as poisons: Spriggan Curse, Dark Venom and Cold Death. Includes a bow, a sword and two daggers.

[size=3][b]INSTALL[/b][/size]

Extract and drop the .esp file in your Skyrim/Data folder. Delete it to uninstall.

[size=3][b]UPDATE 22 sept. 2012[/b][/size]

- Blades (daggers) now fully temperable with an Ebony ingot - until I find better.
- Changed blades model for the Blade of Woe one + Bow model for the classic Ebony Bow.
- \"Lowered\" the Blades stats to daedric but they\'re still very light and swift.
NOTE Somehow I found out that the poison strenght could level up with a high Destruction lvl. or the Alchemy lvl. I still wonder which one affects it but It does. This is BETHESDA not me...
- Now the Blades are also wielded by [color=red][b]Veezara[/b][/color] the DB Argonian Assassin. See description below.

[center][img]http://images.uesp.net/thumb/e/ec/SR-npc-Veezara.jpg/180px-SR-npc-Veezara.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=3][color=lightgreen][b]DARK VENOM BOW[/b][/color][/size]

- Ebony Bow with custom stats - uses the Ebony bow model.
- Can be fully [b]Tempered[/b] - Ebony Perk.
- Unique, and therefore cannot be disenchanted and forged.
Burried with the Dragon Priest [color=yellow][b]Volsung[/b][/color]. Defeat him first!

[b]Custom Enchantment: [color=lightgreen]DARK VENOM[/color][/b]

- [b][color=lightgreen]Poison Damage[/color][/b], 10 health points per seconds during 4 seconds.
- [b][color=lightgreen]Stamina Damage[/color][/b], 20 points.

[b]Bonus effects:[/b] [color=lightgreen][b]Poisoned Darts effect[/b][/color] (green nasty fumes) on enemies. For fun.


[size=3][color=lightgreen][b]DARK VENOM BLADE[/b][/color][/size]

- Ebony Dagger with custom stats.
- Can be fully [b]Tempered[/b] - Ebony Perk.
- Unique, and therefore cannot be disenchanted and forged.
Blade of [color=yellow][b]Deeja[/b][/color], second in command of the Broken Oar pirates. She will be a much more dangerous enemy then...

[b]Custom Enchantment: [color=lightgreen]DARK VENOM[/color][/b]

- Same as the Dark Venom Bow above.


[size=3][color=lightgreen][b]DARK WINTER BLADE[/b][/color][/size]

- Ebony Dagger with custom stats.
- Can be fully [b]Tempered[/b] - Ebony Perk.
- Unique, and therefore cannot be disenchanted and forged.
Blade of [color=yellow][b]Jaree-Ra[/b][/color], leader of the Broken Oar pirates. This will also make him a better opponent, and you will have a [b]Dual dagger set[/b].

[b]Custom Enchantment: [color=lightblue]COLD DEATH[/color][/b]

- [b][color=lightblue]Frost Damage[/color][/b], 20 health points + slows down the enemy.
- [b][color=lightblue]Soul Trap[/color][/b], 5 seconds.

[b]Bonus effects:[/b] [color=lightblue][b]Chillrend\'s frost visual effect[/b][/color] on the blade. Because It\'s awesome.

UPDATE: [color=yellow][b]Veezara[/b][/color] of the Dark Brotherhood has a pair of these sacred blades from the Black Marsh. He\'s related to the two pirates mentioned before.

[spoiler]This means that if you play a \"Full Good\" or super honest character you can acquire these blades from Veezara\'s body after defeating him (\"Detroy the DB\" quest) or directly on his corpse if you joined the DB, before avenging him.[/spoiler]


[size=3][color=lightgreen][b]CRISALYS THE EVERGREEN[/b][/color][/size]

Previoulsy a standalone. Download it [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21317]HERE[/url] if you only want that weapon in your game. Note that if you already installed this older mod, It will be overwritten by this one here. You will keep Crisalys nonetheless.

- Glass Sword with custom stats.
- Can be fully [b]Tempered[/b] with a malachite ingot and some spriggan sap.
- Unique, and therefore cannot be disenchanted and forged.
- Location: Dunmer Alchemist. His remains can be found at the Evergreen Grove, in Castle Vorhikar (Dawnguard DLC) or, more rarely, at some other sacred groves.

[b]Custom Enchantment: [color=lightgreen]SPRIGGAN CURSE[/color][/b]

- [b][color=lightgreen]Spriggan Poison Damage[/color][/b], 15 health points per seconds during 4 seconds.
- [b][color=lightgreen]Stamina Damage[/color][/b], 20 points. The Drain was too costly.

[b]Bonus effects:[/b] [color=lightgreen][b]Spriggan Swarm visual effect[/b][/color] (green sparkles) when you make a [b]critical kill[/b] with the blade. Just for fun.

Ask me on the Comments section if I forgot something or if you want more infos. New poisoned weapons could be included on updates.


ADDED FRENCH VERSION - VERSION FRANCOPHONE AJOUTEE. Optional section.
author: Didier47
